dublin_core.dcvalue: The global system mobile telecommunications system GSM which was recently introduced in Nigeria is now being used by over 40 million people in Nigeria The use of GSM is accompanied with exposure of the users to radiofrequency radiation RFR which if significant may produce health hazards This is the reason why many relevant national and international organizations recommended exposure limits to RFR and why it is made compulsory for GSM handsets to indicate the maximum power output as a guide to potential consumers
Nigerian quarterly journal of hospital medicine
Potential health risks due to telecommunications radiofrequency radiation exposures in Lagos State Nigeria.
